lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal defeated Ivo Karlovic, 6-7 (5), 7-6 (5), 7-6 (4), and reached the Queen’s Club semifinals in London, where he will face the defending champion, Andy Roddick. Roddick advanced when Andy Murray withdrew with a thumb injury.
snippet: Rafael Nadal defeated Ivo Karlovic, 6-7 (5), 7-6 (5), 7-6 (4), and reached the Queen’s Club semifinals in London, where he will face the defending champion, Andy Roddick. Roddick advanced when Andy Murray withdrew with a thumb injury.
